sources.title: 1961 Comedy Horror- Creature from the Haunted Sea - Roger Corman (4K Restored Edition)
sources.description:
Here’s another Roger Corman classic from the golden age of Drive-In schlock! In this spoof of horror and spy thrillers, American gangster Renzo Capetto (Anthony Carbone) decides to kill members of his bungling crew and blame their deaths on a legendary sea creature. What he doesn’t know is that the creature is actually out there!

Original title: Creature from the Haunted Sea (1961)

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/ddc2TYzA38w


Directed by Roger Corman
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdYLD4ZQC1D1o3WC_ePvnOng
Written by Charles B. Griffith 

Main cast:
Antony Carbone - Renzo Capetto
Betsy Jones-Moreland - Mary-Belle Monahan
Robert Towne - Sparks Moran / Agent XK150
Beach Dickerson - Pete Peterson Jr.
Robert Bean - Happy Jack Monahan

Genres: Cult Film, Monster Movie, Comedy, Horror 
Release date: June 1961
Filming location: Puerto Rico

+Bonus audio commentary:  go to settings ⚙️ and select the Audio Track "English Descriptive"


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: The Cast and Crew of a shoe string budget horror film are in for more than they bargained for when they travel to a desolate house in the woods run by the eccentric Aunt Bee. A cross between Living in Oblivion & Hostel this schlock n shock blend of comedy and horror will leave you asking the question Who will make the cut?
metadata.Actors: Robert Z'Dar, Joe Estevez, Larry Thomas
